The selectiondirection attribute is an IDL attribute

column7: The selectiondirection attribute makes it possible to define the direction of the selection in editable text.
• The current selection direction if forward is ""forward""; if the direction is backward, ""backward""; and otherwise, ""none"".

The selectiondirection attribute is an IDL attribute

column7: The selectiondirection attribute makes it possible to define the direction of the selection in editable text.
• The current selection direction if forward is ""forward""; if the direction is backward, ""backward""; and otherwise, ""none"".
